function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive monitoring systems for contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of undetected disease propagation in the built environment","Mitigation":"Implementing advanced monitoring systems for contagious diseases","Technologies":"IoT sensors, AI analysis software","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of the impact of environmental factors on indoor air quality","Impact":"Potential health risks due to poor indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive research on the effects of environmental factors on IAQ","Technologies":"Sensor technologies, data analysis tools","People":"Building occupants, public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited knowledge of early research studies in the field of indoor air quality","Impact":"Risk of overlooking important historical findings related to IAQ","Mitigation":"Encouraging the review and dissemination of early research studies","Technologies":"Data archiving and retrieval systems","People":"Researchers, academics, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations"}]}
